verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְתוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> of praise הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> Make a joyful noise לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> all ye lands
עִבְד֣וּ <WH5647> Serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּשִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> with gladness בֹּ֥אוּ <WH935> come לְ֝פָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before his presence בִּרְנָנָֽה׃ <WH7445> with singing

דְּע֗וּ <WH3045> Know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> ye that the LORD ה֤וּא <WH1931> Himself אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> he [is] God הֽוּא־ <WH1931> Himself עָ֭שָׂנוּ <WH6213> [it is] he [that] hath made [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣ו <WH3808> not ק) אֲנַ֑חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves עַ֝מּ֗וֹ <WH5971> us and not we ourselves [we are] his people וְצֹ֣אן <WH6629> and the sheep מַרְעִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH4830> of his pasture

בֹּ֤אוּ <WH935> Enter שְׁעָרָ֨יו ׀ <WH8179> into his gates בְּתוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> with thanksgiving חֲצֵרֹתָ֥יו <WH2691> [and] into his courts בִּתְהִלָּ֑ה <WH8416> with praise הֽוֹדוּ־ <WH3034> be thankful ל֝֗וֹ בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> unto him [and] bless שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> his name

כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְ֭הֹוָה <WH3068> For the LORD לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [is] everlasting חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> his mercy וְעַד־ <WH5704> against דֹּ֥ר <WH1755> [endureth] to all וָ֝דֹ֗ר <WH1755> generations אֱמוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH530> and his truth
